changelog.text: Task created to debug pip install in devbox environment
Discovered devbox uses Nix with externally managed Python, pip not available
Found uv and poetry available in devbox environment
Identified dependency conflicts: pydantic, httpx, fastapi, openai, crewai, langchain, jsonschema
Fixed all dependency conflicts by updating version constraints
Successfully installed all packages using uv pip install

decisions: Used uv instead of pip due to Nix externally managed Python environment
Updated pydantic from 2.5.0 to >=2.8.0 for mcp compatibility
Updated httpx from 0.25.2 to >=0.27 for mcp compatibility
Updated fastapi from 0.104.1 to >=0.110.0 for anyio compatibility
Updated openai from 1.3.7 to >=1.12.0 for anyio compatibility
Updated crewai from 0.1.0 to >=0.28.0 for langchain compatibility
Updated langchain from 0.0.350 to >=0.1.4 for crewai compatibility
Updated jsonschema from 4.20.0 to >=4.22.0 for crewai compatibility
lessons_learned: Devbox uses Nix which creates externally managed Python environments
uv is the preferred package manager in devbox environments over pip
Dependency conflicts can cascade through multiple packages requiring systematic updates
Virtual environments are created in .venv/ directory and can be accessed directly
